div.p: The establishment of an Insurance Company, on an extensive and liberal plan, is obviously one of the greatest aids that could be given to american Commerce, and I trust the Directors of such a Company will think every method of diminishing the dangers of Navigation as deserving, at least, of examination & experiment._

The inclosed memoir has received no other publicity than a reading before the Philosophical Society in this City, and a few copies I had struck off for particular distribution: Its appearance depends on the publication of the 3d Volume of Transaction. In the meantime give me leave to
to present one to your Direction, and another to yourself individually. I have the honor to be with great respect & Esteem Sir Your obedient Servant Jon Williams
